VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oracle Systems relative to Echo Dynamics?
SRP.A: Oracle Systems is {below} Echo Dynamics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Dynamics relative to Oracle Systems?
SRP.A: Echo Dynamics is {above} Oracle Systems in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Oracle Systems}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Echo Dynamics}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Oracle Systems's maximum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Oracle Systems's maximum Patent Applications is in {2021}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Dynamics's minimum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Dynamics's minimum Patent Applications is in {2016}.

NC.Q: Between 2012 and 2013, did the total Patent Applications experience a larger or smaller change than between 2016 and 2018?
NC.A: The change in total patent applications between 2012 and 2013 was {smaller} than between 2016 and 2018.

NC.Q: Between 2016 and 2020, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 2011 and 2018?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2016 and 2020 was {higher} than between 2011 and 2018.

NC.Q: Between 2016 and 2017, did the total Patent Applications experience a larger or smaller change than between 2014 and 2018?
NC.A: The change in total patent applications between 2016 and 2017 was {smaller} than between 2014 and 2018.

NC.Q: Between 2011 and 2013, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 2014 and 2015?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2011 and 2013 was {higher} than between 2014 and 2015.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Oracle Systems} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Oracle Systems and Echo Dynamics first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Oracle Systems and Echo Dynamics first exchanged leading positions in {2012}.
